resources.string: quizApp

Q1-Android is-
a-an operating system
b-a web browser
c-a web server
d-None of the above

Q2-Under which of the following Android is licensed?
a-OSS
b-Sourceforge
c-Apache/MIT
d-None of the above

Q3-For which of the following Android is mainly developed?
a-Servers
b-Desktops
c-Laptops
d-Mobiles

Q4-Which of the following is the first mobile phone released that ran the Android OS?
a-HTC Hero
b-Google gPhone
c-T-Mobile G1
d-None of the above

Q5-Which of the following virtual machine is used by the Android operating system?
a-JVM
b-Dalvik virtual machine
c-Simple virtual machine
d-None of the above

Q6-Android is based on which of the following language?
a-Java
b-C++
c-C
d-None of the above

Q7-APK stands for -
a-Android Phone Kit
b-Android Page Kit
c-Android Package Kit
d-None of the above

Q8-What does API stand for?
a-Application Programming Interface
b-Android Programming Interface
c-Android Page Interface
d-Application Page Interface

Q9-Which of the following converts Java byte code into Dalvik byte code?
a-Dalvik converter
b-Dex compiler
c-Mobile Interpretive compiler(MIC)
d-None of the above

Q10-How can we stop the services in android?
a-By using the stopSelf() and stopService() method
b-By using finish() method
c-By using system.exit() method
d-None of the above
CORRECTNESS IS \n %1$d OUT OF 10
a
b
c
d
PREVIOUS
NEXT
CORRECT
WRONG
